message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you, and this price reflects the quality and worth of what you're getting.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested, but $9,500 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $7,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your position, $7,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm willing to go. Could you do $8,750?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $8,750 is still a bit high for my budget.  How about we split the difference and do $7,875?
Hi Bob, you're definitely getting closer. I can tell this product would be valuable to you.  How about we meet in the middle at $8,300?
Hi Alice, you're right, I do see the value in this product.  Let's make it happen - how about $8,000?
